title: Poison Dragon Audio Pack
description: The Poison Dragon pack is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of a big dragon that spews poison
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a poison-spewing Dragon


Audio Demo

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Acid Breaths
  • Acid Burns
  • Bites
  • Paw and Tail Swings
  • Steps
  • Vocalization
  • Wing Sound


Number of Audio Waves: 177

Number of Audio Cues: 177

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24 Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 10:24

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: NONE
